name: Gmail List Threads
description: Lists message threads in the user's Gmail mailbox with optional search query.

inputs.name: maxResults
inputs.description: The maximum number of threads to return

inputs.name: pageToken
inputs.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page

inputs.name: labelIds
inputs.description: Only return threads with labels that match all of the specified label IDs (comma-separated)

inputs.name: includeSpamTrash
inputs.description: Include threads from SPAM and TRASH in the results
